publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5594 Cathy Jamieson: The Draft Sexual Offences Act 2003 (Notification Requirements) (Scotland) Regulations 2007—That the Justice 2 Committee recommends that the draft Sexual Offences Act 2003 (Notification Requirements) (Scotland) Regulations 2007 be approved. Supported by: Johann Lamont*

S2M-5594 Cathy Jamieson: The Draft Sexual Offences Act 2003 (Notification Requirements) (Scotland) Regulations 2007—That the Justice 2 Committee recommends that the draft Sexual Offences Act 2003 (Notification Requirements) (Scotland) Regulations 2007 be approved. Supported by: Johann Lamont
